title: Background sound
body: HOW DO I TURN OFF THE ANNOYING BACKGROUND SOUND THAT PLAYS THROUGHOUT THE ENTIRE TIME I HAVE MY CLIENT OPEN?!?!? The only was i have found out to get it to stop is to turn off all of the SFX but then I wont be able to hear anything. Please fix this Riot.

replies.body:
It's a known bug we are working on now. Seems to be happening when you leave the runes page and then save outside of Runes. To get it to stop playing, go back into Runes, click a page and then exit. It should stop playing! I'm working on getting a fix for this ASAP!

Edit - looks like we can piggyback the fix for this when we do a patch for when we find something else that is inevitably broken with all the new Runes stuff that went out. In the meantime, what I wrote above should be a way to stop the ambience! Really sorry about it :/
